entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is called upon to retrieve a bottle of Essence of Dittany from his bag.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: A person who has landed and needs help from Harry. She is mentioned as being in need of the Essence of Dittany.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: A person who is with Hermione and also needs help from Harry. He is mentioned as having his eyes closed, indicating he may be injured or unconscious.

entities.name: Dittany
entities.description: A magical substance that is needed to help Hermione and Ron. It is described as being in a small brown bottle.

entities.name: Essence of Dittany
entities.description: The specific type of Dittany that Harry retrieves from his bag using the spell 'Accio'.

relationships.description: Harry has the Essence of Dittany in his bag, which he retrieves using the spell 'Accio'.
Harry is helping Hermione by retrieving the Essence of Dittany for her.
Harry is also helping Ron by retrieving the Essence of Dittany for him.
